{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=EX3700 |revision=-100NAS |ean=0606449105971 |asin=B00R92CL5E |fcc_date=01/29/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H319 |availability=now |type=range extender |fcc_id=PY314400298 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205DM2I-12G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=DFS, |tp_firmware=LEDE, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|AC 750 WiFi Range Extender - Essentials Edition}} :[http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/EX3700.aspx Product page]
The FCC docs seem to indicate this device is [[MediaTek]] based. {{see also|Netgear EX2700|Netgear|Foxconn}}
